newsitem.title: TANZANIA: Tanzania shilling weakens on dollar, pound.
newsitem.headline: Tanzania shilling weakens on dollar, pound.

text.p: Tanzania's shilling fell versus the dollar and pound on Friday after a week of gains spurred by an International Monetary Fund (IMF) credit deal, dealers said.
Shillings traded at a commercial mean rate of 594.9900 versus the dollar from Thursday's 594.6831. Against the pound, shillings traded at 992.4463 from 987.3554, central bank said.
"The recent (downward) movement of the shilling was artificial, and I think next week, it will strengthen to below 600 because of the IMF credit," one dealer said.
The IMF announced last week a $234 million Enhanced Structural Adjustment Facility for balance of payments support.
